name: Planetarium
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the Stars © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: You project an image of the night sky based on your current location and the local time, allowing you to observe the heavens and all of its celestial bodies and features even during the daytime, indoors, or underground. Anyone within the planetarium's sphere can see the projection, though outside of the sphere the image becomes grainy and indistinct.
effect_zh: 半径15呎，夜空的天体投影
text_zh: 你投影一幅基于当前位置与时间的夜空图像，令你能观测天际与所有的天体及其特征，就算是在白天，室内或地底。任何在行星仪球内的人可以看见这投影，但在球体外的景象则变的颗粒状与模糊。
